abstract: Expansion of benefits granted to United Nations employees who are in same-sex marriages, which includes broadening eligibility requirement, survives elimination attempt by Russia.
lead_paragraph: The United States joined the effort to defeat a Russian proposal that would have invalidated the benefits expansion to United Nations employees who are spouses in same-sex marriages.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; Same-Sex Benefits Survive a Vote

snippet: The United States joined the effort to defeat a Russian proposal that would have invalidated the benefits expansion to United Nations employees who are spouses in same-sex marriages.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
